name: Asteroid Miner (kingcoyote)
description:
Use the W and S keys, or the up/down arrow keys, to move your ship. Shoot at asteroids with the left mouse button. Gather minerals to upgrade your ship. Avoid asteroids and debris to stay alive as long as possible.

Upgrades

Ship Speed upgrades your ship's engines and allows you to maneuver more quickly.

Full Health restores the ships health to full. Health does not restore on its own, and when it reaches 0 the game is over.

Shield Speed increases the recharge rate of the shield. The shield will slowly recharge on it's own, and if it reaches 0, you begin to take health damage.

Fire Speed increases the rate of fire of your weapon.

Mining Range increases the range that you pick up minerals around your ship.
